description: 062I/10Old logging road network just North of Grand Beach.  I haven't ridden there yet, but they do hold MTB races there so it must be at least 1/2  good.
directions: Take Hiway 59/12 about 50km N of Selkirk.  Look for sign to Belair Forest and/or North Star Trail.  It will be well before Victoria Beach.
title: Belair forest on the North Star Trail
